thread.title: Target.com: 25% Off Kitchen Items Today Only = Instant Pot 7-in-1 Only $67.49 (Reg. $99.99) + More
thread.title_full: Target.com: 25% Off Kitchen Items Today Only = Instant Pot 7-in-1 Only $67.49 (Reg. $99.99) + More

author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: Target.com: 25% Off Kitchen Items Today Only = Instant Pot 7-in-1 Only $67.49 (Reg. $99.99) + More
text:
Today only, Target.com is offering up 25% off select Kitchen Items when you use the promo code KITCHEN at checkout. Even sweeter, you can save an additional 10% when you choose to pick your order up in-store – the discount is automatically applied at checkout. And, if you’re a Target REDcard holder , you’ll get an additional 5% off your purchase.
Here are just a few deals you can score… Instant Pot 7-in-1 Pressure Cooker 6 quart $99.99 
Only $67.49 when you use the code KITCHEN and choose to pick it up in-store

KitchenAid Professional 5 Quart Mixer – Black $239.99 
Only $179.99 shipped when you use the code KITCHEN 
* does not qualify for the additional 10% off w/ in-store pick up option 

Ninja Professional Blender 1000 $72.99 
Only $49.27 when you use the code KITCHEN and choose to pick it up in-store
Bodum Brazil 8 Cup French Press Coffee Maker $19.99 
Only $13.49 when you use the code KITCHEN and choose to pick it up in-store
+ More!
